assessment_item.subject: Botany
assessment_item.title: LCMMQK-Q29-’ஏஜென்ட்  ஆரஞ்சு’ என்பது
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

’ஏஜென்ட்  ஆரஞ்சு’ என்பது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

டையாக்சின் கலந்த களைக்கொல்லி

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1215"},{"text":"

ஒளிர்தல் தாவரங்களில் பயன்படுத்தும் வேதிப்பொருள்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1216"},{"text":"

உயிர்ம சிதைவுறும் பூச்சிகொல்லி

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1226"},{"text":"

குழல் விளக்கில் பயன்படும் நிறம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1231"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"LCMMQK-Q29-’ஏஜென்ட்  ஆரஞ்சு’ என்பது","title":"LCMMQK-Q29-’ஏஜென்ட்  ஆரஞ்சு’ என்பது","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
